pullrequest.title: fix Ubuntu warnings: copy gtest pragmas from ign-math

content.raw:
there's still one compiler warning on xenial, but I believe it's due to a gcc bug that has been fixed in gcc6

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64&build=16)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/16/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/16/warnings23Result/
* https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2463113/g-c0x-enum-class-compiler-warnings
* https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=43407
